actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to commemorate the 65th Anniversary of Girl Scouts of the U.S.A. and provide for the designation of the week of March 6-12, 1977, as "Girl Scouts of America Week."

summary.text: Designates the week of March 6-12 1977 as "Girl Scouts of America Week," and requests the President to issue an appropriate proclamation.

titles.title: Joint resolution to commemorate the 65th Anniversary of Girl Scouts of the U.S.A. and provide for the designation of the week of March 6-12, 1977, as "Girl Scouts of America Week."
